amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $300 million from funding for weapons inspectors in Iraq to funding for the Army National Guard and Reserve.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase by $300 million the account for Operation and Maintenance of the Army.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tauscher amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mrs. Tauscher.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tauscher amendment (A026) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
